message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but based on my research and budget, I am only able to consider a price of $700000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your position, we must maintain our minimum price for the product due to its value and exclusivity. We are willing to negotiate further, so we propose a price of $850000 for the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering my current budget constraints, I am willing to offer $800000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
